content: Yes, there are several movies that come to mind which have unexpected and bittersweet endings similar to Bandits. One recent movie that comes to mind is The Perks of Being a Wallflower. The movie builds up characters and stakes that are ripped apart by an unexpected twist that is both bittersweet and satisfying. Other movies that have bittersweet endings or unexpected twists include The Sixth Sense, The Shawshank Redemption, and The Usual Suspects. These movies are great examples of how an unexpected twist can engage, delight, and surprise audiences while giving a unique perspective on the story.
